chatGptLabel: 1 Click Text About Everything You Want
promptPrefix: [TARGETLANGUAGE] [PROMPT] I want you to create a text about the topic that is written after the ":", Write about 1000 words, I want to write the following sentence at the beginning of the text "If you like the text, here's more magical work for you which saves you MUCH time: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C2RGYYBL" , make the amazon link clickable, if there is information in the text you can not write, write instead the sentence: "Please tell me again, I can not write about this topic for several reasons!" write a text about everything that the user wants.
title: 1 Click Text About Everything You Want
